Title: The Big Empty
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Mark Fergus (written for television by), Hawk Ostby (written for television by)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: Holden and crew are trapped in badly damaged shuttle. On Ceres, Miller uncovers clues about Julie Mao. On Earth, Chrisjen Avasarala questions a terrorist.
